trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_SEQ_00<tab>Estinien is ready to escort Mehrahd to safety.
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Ojika Tsunjika at the Baldesion Annex.
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Urianger at Thaumazein.
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Estinien in Akyaali.
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_MEHRAHD_000_000<tab>Estinien is... I think he is not as gruff as he makes out to be.
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_ESTINIEN_000_001<tab>I shall leave you to recruit G'raha. He'll appreciate the invitation that much more, I'm sure.
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_ESTINIEN_000_002<tab>As I recall, he was based at the annex. Someone there ought to be able to point you in the right direction.
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_ESTINIEN_000_003<tab>Let us be off too, Mehrahd. Do me a favor and don't stray from the path.
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_050<tab>Oh, look who it is! Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_051<tab>What might the Students do for you?
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_052<tab>G'raha? Yes, he's in the main hall with Mistress Krile.
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_OJIKATSUNJIKA_000_053<tab>They've been holed up in there for <var 1A 02 /var>days<var 1A 01 /var>. By all means, go and give them an excuse to take a break!
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_GRAHATIA_000_100<tab>Well, she wasn't hard to find, at least...

TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_GRAHATIA_000_150<tab>I've visited Labyrinthos on several occasions recently, but I've not set foot in Thaumazein since the day we boarded the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>...
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_YSHTOLA_000_155<tab>I don't see Thancred anywhere. Was he not supposed to be traveling with Urianger?
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_GRAHATIA_000_200<tab>Ah, the thrill of imminent adventure! I never tire of this feeling.
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_YSHTOLA_000_205<tab>Just imagine the possibilities...

TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_URIANGER_000_210<tab>In my travels, I spied many a child wandering alone─orphans, in all likelihood. Though homes razed by beasts and blasphemies can be rebuilt, the void left by those we have lost cannot so easily be filled...
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_MATSYA_000_215<tab>I will pray to Sanduruva for your safe return. May the wealth of Her blessings guide you to the treasure you seek...
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_ESTINIEN_000_220<tab>I send you to recruit G'raha and you return with an entire survey party.
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_ESTINIEN_000_221<tab>I hope Matsya's boat is sturdy enough to carry us all...
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_YSHTOLA_000_222<tab>What he means is, we are grateful for the use of one of your precious fishing vessels.
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_MATSYA_000_223<tab>We are more than glad for the chance to provide it. I ask only that you take care to steer clear of the reefs in the shallows there.
TEXT_AKTKMH103_04528_ESTINIEN_000_224<tab>Aye, we will keep an eye out.
